Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hi
I am looking for a crawler tool for copyright infringement purposes. I b=
elieve Heritrix could solve that problem? I don't have much knowledge on we=
b crawlers.
I would like to get the crawler integrated with another hosted =
web app. So that the confirmed result from the crawler are passed onto the =
web app for display purposes (e.g. if there are any urls which are involved=
 in infringement).

Also need an advice if I could do the following using H=
eritrix
- specify start and end point of the crawl
- end point of the crawl=
 may be defined after the crawl has been initiated
- regular monitoring of =
pre-programmed sites
- allow additional sites to be added on ad-hoc basis
-=
 collect global results
- results matched to pre determined patterns both a=
utomatically and manually

If I am unable to do any of the above, could any=
one advise of any other web crawler, even if non-open source?
Also, I have =
quickly looked at the Heritrix website, I couldn't find the type of databas=
e required?

Many thanks
Rahil

--_000_98774780138D874AB4EC7B34A9E0FDBFB5637C6B7CPEMEXMBXVS01j_
